mapper.insert: SELECT toa_archive_sub_permission_seq.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL INSERT INTO toa_archive_sub_permission(id,permission_id,data_type,control_id,control_name) VALUES (#{id},#{permissionId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{dataType,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{controlId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{controlName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE toa_archive_sub_permission set
permission_id = #{permissionId},
data_type = #{dataType},
control_id = #{controlId},
control_name = #{controlName},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew} where id = #{id} and MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate}
